file.name: headers-test.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
paths:
  /ko-no-redundant-headers:
    parameters:
      - name: Accept
        in: header
      - name: Authorization
        in: header
      - name: Content-Type
        in: header
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          headers:
            Accept: {}
            Authorization: {}
            Content-Type: {}
  /ok-no-x-header:
    parameters:
      - name: Pascal-Ok
        in: header
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          headers:
            Another-Pascal-Ok: {}
            X-RateLimit-Limit: {}
            x-ratelimit-remaining: {}
            xratelimit: {}
            x-correlation-id: {}
            xantani: {}

  /ko-no-x-header:
    parameters:
      - name: X-Header
        in: header
      - name: x-header
        in: header
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          headers:
            X-Response-Header:
              description: not allowed
            x-response-ko: {}
            xa: {}
            x-bloath: {}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: /ko-no-redundant-headers: parameters: parse parameter "Accept": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
